name: Clairvoyance Model: Projection Censer
description: The exquisitely crafted incense burner model is a scale replica of the Projection Censer used by Granny Itztli. Although the replica does not possess the ability of the original to allow people to share Clairvoyant Shards, it retains the structure of a regular incense burner, enabling users to achieve a calming and sleep-inducing effect through the burning of incense. That said, given its current functionality, the name "Calming Censer" might be more fitting than "Projection Censer"...
